name: Toadally in Love
description:
Kane was in love with Candy and Candy was in love with Kane. Ever since they met, the two have been inseperable. So, when Kane woke up one morning and his beloved girlfriend was not there, he could not even begin to imagine what must have happened to her.

"The new humans at the end of the forest must have caught her...", he thought to himself.

 Of course he had to bring her back! 

Join Kane, the small and anxious frog, on his journey through the dangers of the forest. 

Be way of what lies ahead and be careful, because Kane does not know how to swim.

You can play my game with your gamepad as well as with your mouse and keyboard

To my amazing friend Kaja, who always supported me in one way or another ♥

To my lovely boyfriend Pascâl, who always listened to my vents while working on his own project

And to Alstrak for always finding a way to fix my bugs

This was a 3rd semester project for the htk academy in Hamburg.

Music and Sounds from Epidemic Sounds and WeLoveIndies, implemented with FMOD.

I know this game is not perfect, but i hope you can see how much love and effort i put into this project, in the little time i had
(March 1st - July 31st).

I had a lot of fun while working on it and i enjoyed challenging myself with a new game engine and more or less complicated new ideas.

Thank you for playing :)
